item.title: 🔴 05:28 Air alert in Sumy region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🔴 05:28 Air alert in Sumy region. Follow further messages. #Sumy_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
